summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) inmate record for Jeffrey Epstein, printed on August 10, 2019. It contains his profile, security designation, clearance data, and disciplinary record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where he was being held pre-trial on federal sex trafficking charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the BOP inmate record, detailing his incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on charges of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.

persons.context: Listed as the case manager for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, with contact extension 6457.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York as a pre-trial detainee (A-PRE status) as of August 10, 2019.
Epstein's federal charges were 'Sex Trafficking Conspiracy' and 'Sex Trafficking of Minors.'
The record shows he had no disciplinary entries in the chronological log for the period requested prior to August 10, 2019.
Epstein was housed in 'House 2/Range 04/Bed 206LAD' and was assigned a case manager (Z. Gardner) and unit manager (N. Reid).
The document is a standard BOP administrative record, indicating routine custodial management prior to Epstein's death.
